channel.title: attack.t1018 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1018 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: DirectorySearcher Powershell Exploitation
item.description: Enumerates Active Directory to determine computers that are joined to the domain

item.title: Correct Execution of Nltest.exe
item.description: The attacker might use LOLBAS nltest.exe for discovery of domain controllers, domain trusts, parent domain and the current user permissions.

item.title: Suspicious AdFind Execution
item.description: Detects the execution of a AdFind for Active Directory enumeration

item.title: Cisco Discovery
item.description: Find information about network devices that is not stored in config files

item.title: Windows Network Enumeration
item.description: Identifies attempts to enumerate hosts in a network using the built-in Windows net.exe tool.

item.title: Net.exe Execution
item.description: Detects execution of Net.exe, whether suspicious or benign.

item.title: AdFind Usage Detection
item.description: AdFind continues to be seen across majority of breaches. It is used to domain trust discovery to plan out subsequent steps in the attack chain.

item.title: Linux Remote System Discovery
item.description: Detects the enumeration of other remote systems.

item.title: Macos Remote System Discovery
item.description: Detects the enumeration of other remote systems.

item.title: Suspicious Execution of Adidnsdump
item.description: This tool enables enumeration and exporting of all DNS records in the zone for recon purposes of internal networks Python 3 and python.exe must be installed, Usee to Query/modify DNS records for Active Directory integrated DNS via LDAP
